programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Logan decides to write and direct a low-budget action flick at the beach using a drugged shark as the villain, but things get out of hand when the shark Is not properly sedated!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When Mitch Judges the Miss Malibu Beach Bikini Contest, his willpower is tested by two competitors who will do anything to get his vote. Later, Cody designs the "Windjet,” an innovative, new lifesaving boat/waverunner combination.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: CJ befriends Max, a homeless eccentric who claims that he was once a famous Hollywood Costume designer. When Max dies suddenly, CJ learns he was rich and has left her $4 million in his will. Manny joins junior lifeguards.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: At the annual Baywatch Lifeguard Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite. The relationship gets complicated when they get stranded on an island and their social status is reversed. Cody joins a local roller hockey team.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach. Lifeguarding gets more chaotic for the team when the Secret Service shows up to inform them that the President is going to go jogging on the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA takes over the SAP Center in San Jose with a highly anticipated light-weight showdown between Josh “The Punk” Thomson and Patricky Pitbull. Also, heavyweight knockout artist Cheick Kongo takes on former training partner Oli Thomson.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Belfast, Ireland with former Light Heavyweight Champ Liam McGeary facing off against Brett McDermott. Plus rising Irish star James Gallagher!

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Rampage Jackson and King Mo go to battle in a highly anticipated rematch nearly three years in the making from the Allstate Arena in Illinois. And feared Russian heavyweight knockout artist Sergei Kharitonov returns to the cage.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Bellator 178: Straus vs Pitbull 4

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to London with a stacked card featuring a showdown between top welterweights Paul “Semtex” Daley and Rory MacDonald, along with appearanc-es from Michael “MVP” Page, Cheick Kongo, Baby Slice and Liam McGeary.

programme.title: Bellator NYC: Sonnen vs Silva

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC lleva a cabo una búsqueda en Los Ángeles después de que el equipo descubre imágenes de seguridad que muestran a un sospechoso siendo invitado a las casas de las víctimas.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La esposa de un Marine especializado en la detección de bombas K-9 urge al equipo de NCIS para que investigue la reciente muerte de su marido en Afghanistan.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una tormenta masiva embarca al equipo de NCIS en el USS Borealis, donde todos se convierten en sospechosos una vez que la escena del crimen revela que la Madre Naturaleza no era la única responsable.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Una reservista Naval acude al equipo de NCIS luego de volver a su casa y encontrar el living de su casa ensangrentado y a su esposo desaparecido.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras que el equipo de NCIS investiga el asesinato de un oficial del Mossad en Virginia, Tony y Ziva viajan a Berlín para rastrear al asesino de su padre.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Consecuencias del pasado
programme.desc: Danny y Baez buscan a una banda de ladrones en una ola de crímenes, y se unen al detective Jimmy Mosley, quien años atrás rompió el corazón de Baez.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Hacia lo inimaginable
programme.desc: El asesino en serie Thomas Wilder desafía a Danny con un mensaje en su última víctima, convirtiendo el juego del gato y el ratón en una venganza personal.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La milla extra
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony emprenden una búsqueda para encontrar a un testigo clave que huyó por miedo a represalias y convencerlo de testificar.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Boomerang
programme.desc: Estalla la indignación pública cuando no se procesa a un policía que disparó a un adolescente, afectando a Frank, el alcalde y la oficina de Erin. Danny busca al autor de un posterior tiroteo contra un oficial, posible caso de venganza.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se dirige a Wichita en busca de un sospechoso que secuestra niños mientras sus padres duermen. Además, Morgan está intentando averiguar quién fue el responsable del ataque.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando un sujeto ataca a la UAC, el equipo entra en acción para averiguar quién es el responsable.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug takes the guys to the Super Bowl of single life: Spring Break! They convince the girls they're headed to a vineyard, but after a few drinks, their lies start to unravel.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug crashes at Tommy and Tammy's and shares a bunk bed with Hunter. Chris goes overboard at a storage auction, and Jared tries to make the next big internet video.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris and Aimee try to spice up their love life. Jared opens a Haunted Frog Gigging Tour, and Wendy goes on a date!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug and Wendy co-host a birthday party for Presley. Chris puts Mason through a boot camp, and Jared wins a timeshare!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared's dream vacation turns into a nightmare when the family first gets to the Bahamas and sees a side of the island far different than the brochures.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The family gets settled into their new Bahamas villa and Jared uses the home owner card to get onto a mega yacht.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The family's local friend takes them on a day trip to a deserted island, only they get stranded there for the night!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The family's Bahamas vacation is coming to an end, but not before a huge surprise visit from Wendy, Christian, and Shane and some close encounters with sharks.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin kicks off season two with eight badasses who will go head to head in three new challenges. The last man standing will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin invites the first eight women to visit the ranch. The last woman standing will take on the new Skullbuster for a shot at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight tough badasses are ready to rumble. But will they have what it takes to get through Snatch, Loaded and Cranked? The last man standing earns the right to take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight stout badass women arrive at the ranch to face off in Snatch, Barn Burner and Cranked before they get a chance at the Skullbuster and a shot at $10,000 if they can beat the benchmark time.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: In this highly contentious Broken Skull Challenge, eight tough as nails male athletes compete in Trench Warfare, Loaded and Hard Labor for a chance to win $10,000. Will their prayers be answered or will their dreams be shattered

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new competitors try and prove they are the toughest badass in the country. The winner moves on to face the Skullbuster and a chance at Steve Austin's $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight hardcore athletes have come to the Broken Skull Challenge to go head to head in Rip Off, Ass Kicker and Grip & Rip. The winner goes on to face Steve's Skullbuster for a chance at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Another eight tough as nails women come to the ranch with one goal in mind - making it to the Skullbuster. Will the one who succeeds walk away with $10,000?

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 04/17/2015. Home to a dazzling array of animals, Bill Weir visits the Everglades to skim the waters, dive the swamp and meet its extraordinary residents.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/07/2017. What’s the best way to protect paradise? In stunning Patagonia, an American conservationist has purchased vast tracts of land to the fury of local developers.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/14/2017. As deforestation rages and unique species vanish, the fight is on to save one of the planet’s most special places before it is ruined forever.

programme.title: Declassified

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 7/10/2016. The FBI and Defense Intelligence Agency join forces to catch Ana Montes, a senior DIA analyst who was passing sensitive intelligence to Cuba.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect fresh out of jail is found with narcotics. A motorcycle named 'Love Machine' is saved from a hot wire. A man bursts his tire in a bad place and officers come to the rescue.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Suspects flee an overturned auto, a man is accused of battery with a chain leash, and an unlucky gambler is dealt another losing hand by police when he decides to drive drunk.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A quiet passenger makes a run for it during a traffic stop, a stolen puppy is safely returned to its family, and a struggling woman hits a speed bump on her road to recovery.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distressed woman leads the cops to her abusive fiance, and a couple of officers are suspicious when they pull over an overly friendly man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man has a hard time making his case when a bag of illicit items has his name on it. A talkative driver tells officers a long story with conflicting details. A couple calls for help when they find an alligator in their yard.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a routine traffic stop, an Officer recognizes the passengers from a prior drug related arrest. A K-9 unit assists in the pursuit of a grand theft auto suspect who flees on foot.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A trespassing suspect claims to be a federal informant, officers inspect an erratically driven car and find a safe, and a familiar face swears this time she's going to rehab.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The occupants of a car try to conceal their identities. Officers investigate a vehicle lingering near a park known for illicit sexual activity. Officer investigates a robbery claim at a truck stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman makes a desperate attempt to frame her friend right in front of deputies. A driver’s assortment of containers raises some questions. A man in possession of a stolen truck insists that his friend is the one at fault.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A narcotics sting in Alabama yields arrests, officers chase a drunk driver to his front yard, and a woman who called the police for help does not make a good case for herself.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends abruptly when the suspect makes a wrong turn, and a nervous man attempts to hide his crime when he thinks no one can see him.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect driving a stolen vehicle. A biohazard bin an illegal knife and drugs are found during a traffic stop. Agents go undercover in an area known for heavy drug activity.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police break up a street-racing ring, a driver tries to make light of his drug-possession charge, and a woman with a felony arrest warrant is fixated on her oral hygiene.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Carjacking victims flag down officers whom then locate, pursue and acquire the stolen vehicle, and a man admits to officers the car he's driving is stolen.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man who threatened his neighbors redirects his anger toward the deputies, and a driver in crisis puts the lives of others on the line.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An unstable man in a standoff with officers begs to be shot, a drunk woman is accused of beating her spouse, and unwanted guests occupy the garage of an out-of-town homeowner.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police try to settle a dispute between roommates, a jilted man causes a disturbance at a public park twice in one day, and an erratic driver proves to be surprisingly sober.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A traffic stop escalates to a dangerous situation, a woman admits to hitting her dad in the face with her teeth, and a defiant driver doesn't want deputies to search his car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A generous boyfriend steps in to prevent his girlfriend from going to jail. Officers save a kitten who wants to hide in a dangerous place. A man says he’s been driving a stolen truck for one day, but he’s off by a few months.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man wearing women’s underwear exposes himself. While on patrol officers question a naked man in the backseat of a vehicle who explains to officers that he’s camping. It takes several officers to take down a deranged naked man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers stop a suspicious pedestrian, police and their K-9 dog search for weapons in a suspect's vehicle, and a wanted woman is stopped on a moped with her pet dog.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An intoxicated man suspected of domestic abuse refuses to obey deputies' orders, police find drugs in a woman's car, and an alleged prostitute encounters the police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcycle with no license plate crashes while fleeing from Deputies. A woman driving a car with no windshield blames her ex-boyfriend. A gun is found hidden in a seat during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers suspect meth use by a man sleeping in a bus station, a pedestrian's multiple bags of drugs suggest trafficking, and a drunk driver claims she was set up.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Jane Galloway is a nervous breakdown waiting to happen. She has completely shielded herself from the outside world, but that doesn't stop a stalker in her attic from killing her.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate the stabbing death of an 80-year-old woman who lived in a run-down house full of cats.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Sara investigate when a man's body, which has been doused with lye, is found buried in a park.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his crew handle their highest profile case to date when the city's former chief of detectives is slain execution-style in his house following a wild party.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate when the body of an unidentified young woman is discovered stuffed in an overturned shopping cart near a freeway underpass.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine and Nick investigate street racing after one of the drivers is found dead out in the desert at an abandoned airstrip.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate a crime involving a popular actor.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate the murder of a wealthy couple who are found outside their home, which was up for sale.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom suspects murder when the body of a dwarf is found hanging from a rope high above a stage in a casino hotel where a convention of little people is being held.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Warrick, and Sara investigate when a woman vanishes while taking part in a magician's act.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Fifteen years ago, Catherine helped put a man on death row for the rape and murder of a coed at a nearby college. The man is about to be executed when he's granted a stay based on new DNA evidence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A boxing champ dies in the ring after taking a brutal beating from his nemesis, but Grissom finds evidence that points to murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine is called in by a pornographic-film developer to view graphic footage from a snuff movie in which a woman is brutally slain.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A cab driver seems to run over a boy and is then beaten to death by a mob for racial reasons.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan un crimen que involucra a un popular actor.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Catherine investigan el asesinato de una pareja adinerada que aparece en el exterior de su casa, que estaba en venta.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom sospecha de un asesinato cuando el cuerpo de un enano aparece colgado de una cuerda en lo alto de un escenario en un hotel casino donde se celebra una convención de gente pequeña.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Warrick y Sara investigan cuando una mujer desaparece mientras participa en el número de un mago.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Hace quince años, Catherine ayudó a condenar a muerte a un hombre por la violación y asesinato de una alumna de una universidad cercana. El hombre está a punto de ser ejecutado cuando se le concede una suspensión basada en nuevas pruebas de ADN.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: Amores peligrosos

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda

programme.title: Volando Alto

programme.title: El hombre sin pasado

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of excited and anxious Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders hopefuls arrive at Texas Stadium for the preliminary auditions. After performing their freestyle dance routines for the judges, only half make it to the semi-finals.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: In the final audition, the competition really heats up. Now, surviving candidates must go head-to-head against experienced veteran cheerleaders for a coveted spot in the DCC Training Camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Making it this far is one thing - enduring Training Camp is another. The hopeful group of 43 is far from the final squad, and DCC Director Kelli Finglass quickly reminds them that there will be cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Only two weeks into training camp, it's time to start making cuts. While "veteran" cheerleaders model bikinis for their upcoming calendar shoot, anxious training camp "rookies" dance their hearts out to prove to Kelli and Judy that they deserve to stay.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: After saying goodbye to one of their own, reality sets in for the remaining training camp candidates: nobody's position on the squad is secure. The girls are fitted for the revealing DCC uniforms, then sweat their way through a punishing physical workout

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The training camp candidates don't know what hit them when tough as nails and brutally honest guest choreographer Kitty Carter teaches a class. Then, the rookies get one step closer to transforming into Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies get to wear the iconic Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders uniform for the very first time during a professional modeling shoot. Then the girls have a life-changing experience skydiving with the legendary Army parachute team, the Golden Knights!

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: DCC training camp comes down to the last grueling rehearsals and whose long legs fit into the famous kick-line. The cheerleaders attend a bikini boot-camp for last-minute toning. Then, amid tears of disappointment and shock, Kelli makes the final cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Over 600 excited and anxious Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders hopefuls arrive at Texas Stadium for the preliminary auditions.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: In the finals audition, the competition really heats up. Now, surviving candidates must go head-to-head against experienced veteran cheerleaders for a coveted spot in the DCC Training Camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Training Camp begins! The newly elected training camp candidates are excited, even star-struck, as they meet the veterans for the first time at Valley Ranch.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The group competes in a grueling army fitness test to try and earn the privilege of being on the elite "Power Squad." At that evening's rehearsal, the first cuts will be made.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies are given "makeovers" to transform them into the image of a DCC.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The entire squad needs a wake-up call and guest choreographer Kitty Carter gives it to them.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The final dance rehearsal of week 7 has a surprise guest judge who puts everyone on edge. Ultimately, in Kelli's office, the tears flow as some dreams surprisingly come to an end.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Join 65,000 screaming Cowboys fans as the cheerleaders hit the turf and wow the entire stadium and themselves during their first Dallas Cowboys football game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: This is the inside story of selecting this year's Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders squad with all the emotion and drama as hundreds of women hope to fill the 45-member team.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: This is the inside story of selecting this year's Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders squad with all the emotion and drama as hundreds of women hope to fill the 45-member team.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: If the candidates thought auditions were tough, they have no idea how brutal training camp will be. Kelli has to call three girls into her office for warnings...who will survive the first week of training camp?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: It's only the third week of training camp and it's already time to make cuts. Who will survive? The week starts with uniform fittings where even the wannabes get to try on the famous blue and white star-studded outfit.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The girls are in the dark about what Kelli and salon director Rainer Schneck have planned for them when they get their dramatic Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders makeovers.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: When DCC Director, Kelli Finglass, gives a former contestant a once-in-a-lifetime second chance to join training camp three weeks late, there is a lot of catching up to do.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.desc: A Tennessee resident is murdered in her bedroom; investigators have little evidence and struggle to find answers.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.desc: A look at the crimes committed by Charles Manson and his followers in 1969, including archival footage and interviews with those close to the events.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The sister of a man who died after robbing a bank when a bomb that was placed around his neck detonated talks about the case.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Flavor of Love: Steppin' Out Flav Style

programme.desc: Flavor Flav and all 20 of the Flavorettes from season 2 are back for a reunion show like you've never seen before.

programme.title: I Love New York: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: With only four guys left it's time to clean house, literally. New York has invited some special guests-the guy's parents, so she gets her boys to scour and scrub her house for their arrival.

programme.title: I Love New York: Miami Thrice
programme.desc: After the last elimination, New York tells her final three men to pack their bags because they're heading to Miami!

programme.title: I Love New York: Clip Show
programme.desc: In this 30-minute special episode, NY hosts a look back at hilarious, never-before-seen moments with our favorite guys from the series.

programme.title: I Love New York: Rasta Finale
programme.desc: After a season of ups and downs and a tense elimination in Miami, it's down to New York's final two suitors. They accompany New York to the tropics of Jamaica for the final showdown.

programme.title: Wife Swap Australia

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: The contestant picks one case which is theirs to keep. As each of the 25 cases is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in their case decreases or increases, with ‘the Banker’ tempting the player throughout the game.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Just when Terri thought she’d gotten over her ex boyfriend, Rick, he makes a concerted effort to win back her affections. She and her friends are wary – after all, leopards can’t change their spots.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s determined that he and the guys will be the “Last Band Standing” at Degrassi’s battle of the bands and win a spot on the show. So he sets the guys a fierce practice schedule and starts to write a killer new song.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The year-end Junior Formal is fast approaching, and Marco is in charge, except when it comes to a date. Problem is, Marco’s too nervous to ask Dylan out at all, let alone ask him to the prom.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A stressed-out Paige and Spinner decide they need a break and skip school for the day. Ashley, meanwhile, is in the doldrums, too “sick” to go to school. So when Ashley calls Paige to get her homework, Paige decides Ash needs to join them in a little fun.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Once again, as things finally start to come together for Sean, the other shoe drops - his brother and guardian, Tracker, has found a new job in Alberta. Sean thinks his life is over until he finds out that he can legally live on his own.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The year end semi-formal is only hours away and Marco has transformed the gym into an idealized Bombay. It promises to be an amazing event, except Marco’s theme is causing tension between him and Ellie. Ellie finds the whole idea racist

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s the end of summer and Paige receives some unexpected news - her rape case has finally made it to trial and she’s the star witness. Finally…justice!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Shocked by the outcome of the trial, Paige holes up in her room. But when Marco is able to coax her out to party at Dylan’s dorm with the gang, things go from bad to worse when she and Spinner have a blow-out fight.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s a shoo-in for Student Council President until Alex enters the race. While at first Alex seems an unlikely candidate, her strong opinions and anti-establishment platform take hold with the students and Marco realizes she might well win.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Feeling ignored on Student Council, Emma finds a way to get her voice heard when she takes up a new cause - ganging up with the cool kids to keep Terri’s abusive ex-boyfriend Rick, out of Degrassi.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are going great for Sean and Ellie, Degrassi’s most unlikely couple—so well that Sean asks Ellie to move in. Despite their closeness, Ellie hesitates and Sean doesn’t understand why.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In her quest to repay Spinner for damage to his car, Alpha Paige has gone all beta. Suddenly, Spin’s using his new-found powers to zap whatever self-confidence Paige has left.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick returns to Degrassi after the “Whack Your Brain” debacle at the hands of Spinner, Jay, and Alex. Toby and Mr. Raditch try to convince him to take the afternoon off, to go home and cool off, but an oddly calm Rick chooses to stay.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After the shooting at Degrassi, the full school board counseling response team moves in. And so does the media. Local reporter, Rachel Roberts, has decided to make Sean the hero of her piece.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig has a problem – the recording deal he and his band won last year is about to expire, but “Downtown Sasquatch” is nowhere near ready to record. With Jimmy in the hospital, they’re missing a key member.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s back with Ashley and he’s determined not to screw it up this time.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Distraught when Ashley refuses his proposal, Craig falls into a major rage, completely trashing his hotel room.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Degrassi has a new hottie in Grade 9 and Manny’s got her eye on him. Especially since her “boyfriend” Spinner can’t even be bothered to take a night off work to come to the Cupid Dance she’s organized.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Something’s wrong with Emma. Though she’s frustrated at being treated with kid gloves by everyone since the school shooting, she’s not sure how she’d rather be treated. So she just keeps going on, numbly reassuring everyone that she’s fine.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma steps into the lead role in Dracula, but her recent extra-curricular activities with Jay prove even more dramatic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner has difficulty dealing with the return of injured Jimmy. He hasn’t talked to him since the shooting, and his guilt over what he did leaves him unable to welcome Jimmy back to school.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ellie is finding it hard to make ends meet now that she’s living on her own and hates relying on her mother for rent, especially with its obligatory dinners to pick up the cheque.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige and Matt are totally in love, so what if they have to keep it secret? It’s worth all the extra effort.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With school coming to a close, Marco is making huge plans for his summer with Dylan – and their future. He’s considering fast-tracking to graduate high school, joining Dylan in university a year earlier.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After dutifully picking up the Spirit Squad slack for a love-struck Paige all year, Manny feels betrayed when Paige claims all the glory. So Manny plots her revenge with a complicated cheer that leaves Paige with a broken leg on Prom Night.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley’s leaving for the summer, and the idea of their temporary farewell and the stress of writing a song for Kevin Smith’s movie -- is making him, well, nuts. So Craig decides to do whatever it takes to follow her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: For thousands of years, downtown LA hid an indiscriminate killer. In one of the most surprising wildlife crime stories in the world, `Natural World' turns forensic detective to solve the mystery and unmask victims and killers.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Bird expert Bill Oddie helps construct amazing, life-sized, bio-mechanical replicas as he presents an imaginary battle between a tyrannosaurus rex and a triceratops.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Here, Bill Oddie asks whether the Velociraptor was really the monstrous predator of popular legend.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The life of the first reptilian carnivores on Earth, told through computer animation.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic period saw the advent of the largest and strongest dinosaurs that ever roamed the Earth.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A look at the world as it was 149 million years ago - in the late Jurassic Period. The old continents have broken up and much of the land is under water. Huge shallow seas have supported a revolution in marine life.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: With wings longer than those of a small plane, pterosaurs were the largest creatures ever known to have flown.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This programme looks at the Cretaceous period, 106 million years ago. Volcanic activity forces the continents apart, and dinosaurs diversify into a range of species to cope with environmental extremes.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is the late Cretaceous period and Tyrannosaurus rex is the top predator, but the Earth is poisoned by volcanic activity and a comet strikes.

programme.title: Land of Giants: A Walking With Dinosaurs Special
programme.desc: Witness the spectacle of the fearsome predator Giganotosaurus.

programme.title: The Giant Claw: A Walking With Dinosaurs Special
programme.desc: Zoologist Nigel Marvin travels back in time on a prehistoric safari.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Little Jennifer is thrilled about getting a visit from her former neighborhood pal, Scott, whom she hasn't seen in five years.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: As an economics student, Alex finds it demeaning to be forced into a public service position, but his experiences at the crisis center give him a new outlook on life.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Steven gets depressed from interviewing frightfully inept candidates as housekeeper-nanny for the baby, such as a child-hater ad an ex-con.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: While Steven and Elyse are away on vacation, Mallory accidentally crashes her parents' car into a telephone pole. The kids need to raise money for auto repairs and decides to turn the Keaton house into a hotel.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex's chances for acceptance into a smug college fraternity are dependent upon him having a knockout date for the pledge dance.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Mallory is crushed when her favorite aunt dies suddenly, but her feelings of sadness turn to anger when family and friends at the funeral seem to be taking Aunt Trudy's death too lightly.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex befriends Donna, a young, unwed expectant mother from Elyse's natural-childbirth class.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex falls asleep while working on a college term paper on Thomas Jefferson and dreams that his family and friends are living 200 years ago.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: To help Steven during pledge week at the television station, the Keatons reluctantly agree to be part of the entertainment. The audience gets an unexpected show when Elyse goes into labor right on camera while in the middle of a song.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: A snowstorm prevents Elyse from getting to the hospital in time to deliver her baby.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jennifer is jealous of the attention paid to Andrew.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex and his good friend James go into business together as tutors for their fellow students at Leland.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: With the rest of the Keaton family away for the weekend, Mallory is excited about having the house to herself until she is accidentally locked in the basement with the person she'd least like to be with--her adoring neighbor, Skippy.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: With Elyse back at work, Steven is frustrated when her schedule and the baby's schedule aren't allowing them any free time together.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Steven takes a nostalgic trip to his hometown following the death of his father. With the support of Elyse and the children, he tries to prepare his mother for her new life (Part 1 of 2)

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Cousin June visits the Keatons, on holiday from her university studies in London. Memories bubble up when she starts talking about dating boys and a trip to Florence, most embarrassing moments for Keatons.

programme.title: Family Ties

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la primera parte del estreno de la temporada, dieciséis concursantes tienen la oportunidad de alcanzar el estrellato culinario y un puesto de Chef ejecutivo en la ciudad turística canadiense de Whistler, Columbia Británica.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la parte final del estreno de temporada, vuelve un competidor de la quinta temporada y los quince cocineros restantes se preparan para una cena marinera.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay despierta a los Chefs restantes en medio de la noche y les ordena que preparen una cena de espaguetis para los bomberos hambrientos. Los perdedores deben lavar y encerar los camiones de bomberos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los competidores deben crear perros calientes de proporciones perfectas para las celebridades Drew Lachey, John O'Hurley, Tom Green, Melinda Clarke, Christopher 'Kid' Reid y Kristy Swanson.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los doce Chefs restantes deberán planificar un saludo gastronómico por el regreso de un marine americano. El equipo perdedor tendrá que limpiar y decorar la fiesta de Tana Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes deben crear comidas de tres platos que sumen solo 700 calorías. Los ganadores fueron a la playa con la jugadora de voleibol de playa Annett Davis.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes tiran los dados para determinar qué ingredientes usar para su plato de desafío. El equipo ganador gana un viaje a Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los nueve Chefs restantes realizan una prueba de sabor a ciegas. Los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay en un comedor completamente oscuro donde no pueden ver lo que están comiendo.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes hacen crepes. Los ganadores cenarán en un restaurante francés mientras los perdedores se preparan para un servicio de cena con temática francesa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los medallistas olímpicos de invierno Sasha Cohen y Jonny Moseley aparecen como jueces invitados. Para este desafío, todos los ingredientes deben provenir de Whistler, B.C.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis participantes restantes deben replicar los platos que les preparó el Chef Ramsay. Los ganadores cenarán con la ganadora de la cuarta temporada, Christina Machamer.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El desafío para cada uno de los concursantes restantes es hacer un plato que se vea y sepa igual. Los expertos de la revista 'Bon Appetit' ayudan al Chef Ramsay a juzgar.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los participantes conocen una versión en miniatura del Chef Ramsay: el actor y chico impresionista británico Felix Light. Deben preparar comidas sin carne para él y otros ochenta jóvenes.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3

programme.desc: Gabriela le pide a Sarita que atienda a su hermana Norma, al verla muy nerviosa. Franco se enfada cuando se entera de la boda apresurada de Jimena, ella encuentra la forma de calmarlo.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Leandro sigue a Jimena y descubre quién es su enamorado, él se divierte cuando su prometida se molesta. La llegada de Ruth, la hija de Raquel, paraliza la celebración del compromiso.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Los Reyes están impresionados con Ruth por su parecido con Libia, ella se interesa por uno de ellos, Eva se acerca a pesar de las advertencias de Gabriela. Sara descubre a Norma con Juan.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad recibe una importante noticia del juez y Lucas pide que se investigue quién secuestró a su nieta. Antonia acepta ser pianista en el taberna, se disfraza para que no la reconozcan.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Hugo recibe la carta que supuestamente le envía Michelle, no se percata que Soledad llega a la cabaña en ese instante, ella conmovida por el mensaje, toma una decisión. Eloísa es amenazada.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Hugo reacciona impulsivamente cuando Úrsula le cuenta que Soledad tomó una decisión sobre Daniel. Eloísa tiene una misión que cumplir en casa de Soledad, pero Antonia la descubre.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad escapa a las súplicas de Hugo para reconquistarla, mientras Daniel los busca en los alrededores de la mina. El juez detiene a un sospechoso del secuestro de Aurora.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Alejandro golpea con una rabia descontrolada a Macario y termina en la comisaría. Por ahora, no podrá salir de prisión. Constanza y Gastón encuentran un sobre con la llave de una bóveda de un banco y una tarjeta electrónica con la foto de Antonia.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Lucho e Irene descubren que Antonia es la dueña del prostíbulo La casa de las muñecas. Alejandro está encarcelado en el mismo lugar que el Lagarto. Rodrigo pide una orden de registro para entrar en casa de Guerra.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Gastón cuenta en su programa de radio que Antonia Guerra es la dueña del prostíbulo. Antonia hace firmar a Aníbal un documento donde pone sus bienes a nombre de ella, para protegerlos de Constanza.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Una bomba cae en San Pedro: Verónica hace circular fotos de cuando Antonia era prostituta y dueña del burdel. Alejandro se enoja con las imágenes, mientras Guerra no puede frenar los ataques en su contra. Chacón quiere colaborar con la justicia.

programme.desc: Fernando se emborracha, él se disculpa con Norma pero la tensión entre ellos es cada vez más explosiva y comete una locura. Rosario regresa al bar Alcalá y discute con Armando.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads to Seminole country in the Florida Everglades and gets way more than he bargained for. This adventure's got him uncovering alligator nests, and wranglin' some big gators that need to be released back into the wild.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Panama's Bocas del Toro archipelago is home to beautiful beaches and pristine waters, and it's also home to a high concentration of Bats! Jack hikes into a remote cave for an up-close look at the beneficial species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is counting down the loud mouths of the animal world. Howler monkeys, sperm whales, wolves and lions are just a few of the famous talkers on today’s show. Find out which “call of the wild” is the loudest of all!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Bottoms Up
programme.desc: Jungle Jack goes to the ends of the Earth to meet nature's most captivating creatures! Today, adventures from the frigid waters of South America to elephant country in Africa and all the way up to Alaska's Glacier Bay.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Getting Around
programme.desc: Traveling the world in search of exotic animals, like migrating wildebeest, rare mountain gorillas, and amazing underwater sea life, Jungle Jack has hitched rides on hot-air balloons, camels, and even submarines!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: In Africa, the Lion is king! This is the only place on the planet where white lions roam free. Join Jack as he searches for Big Cats and Big Adventure in the unique arid landscape of Sanbona!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Feeding Frenzy
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is filled with delicious and nutritious adventures. From carnivores like jackals, lions, and sharks to our vegetarian friends, the elephants, Jungle Jack is gearing up for a Feeding Frenzy!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Stinkiest Stinkers
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he sniffs out the smelliest animals on the planet! Sloths, Tasmanian devils, sperm whales, binturongs, hyenas, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack for a countdown dedicated to the largest members of the great ape family… gorillas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Helping Hands
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is counting down animals that count on us! Baboons crossing the road in South Africa, dogs getting vaccinated in Botswana, orphans getting nursed back to health in Panama…it’s six stories about lending a helping hand.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: At the Serra Canastra National Park, near the town of Sao Roque de Minas, Jack sets off in search of Brazil's Giant Anteater. Jack also visits the humble beginnings of Rio Zoo Francisco, the country's longest river.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Jack to the Future
programme.desc: Today, it’s a two-for-one special, as Jack travels to each location TWICE! Cheetahs, rhinos, manatees, kangaroos and more! Join Jack for time-traveling tour through natural history.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack's epic adventure to the Serengeti unfolds with a once-in-a-lifetime look at the great migration of wildebeest and zebra. Then Jack encounters elephants, lions, and an African rock python and he pays a visit to a local school.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: An old Air Force radar station converted into a small lodge provides Jack with a perfect platform for bird watching in Panama's Sobering National Park. Among the many tropical birds Jack spots from high atop Canopy Tower is the beautiful Blue Cotinga.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Black & White
programme.desc: What do penguins, skunks and colobus monkeys have in common? These colorful creatures will show everyone why black and white is unforgettable. Join in as Jack counts them down to number one!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack meets up with amazing animal moms and the little ones they care for. A jaguar looking after her cub, a baby bear sleeping alongside its mom, a white rhino protecting her calf, a cheetah mom in South Africa and whole herd of elephant mammas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Gabon is home to some of the wildest beaches on the planet, and Pongara is no exception. Come along with Jack as he witnesses one of nature's most awe-inspiring feats -- one-ton Leatherback Sea Turtles returning to shore to lay their eggs.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Check out just how wild a zoo can get. Come along with Jack as he visits some of the most innovative Zoos around the world and meets creatures like, Orangutans, Koalas, Sea Lions, Camels, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Animals adapt to survive in some truly wild ways! Camels equipped for life in scorching heat, frigate birds donning red to attract a mate, geckos disappearing into the forest, musk oxen who don’t know the meaning of a bad hair day, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets up with researchers on the front-lines of animal conservation as they work to protect Elephants, Lions, Rattlesnakes, Bats and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets creatures armed with superb scales, like Nile Crocodiles, Galapagos Tortoises, Thorny Devils, an African Rock Python, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack, Suzi, and Kathaleen explore Phinda Game Reserve in South Africa alongside Lions, Hippos, Rhinos, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack visits the beautiful city of Quito, Ecuador, and the Quito Zoo for an incredible up-close encounter with a Jaguar and its newborn cub, and sees Andean Condor conservation in action.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Whether they cross huge distances in a single leap like kangaroos, or gracefully soar above the waves like dolphins, or escape from predators like frogs, all of today’s countdown creatures are built to bounce, bound and jump around.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with the ultimate Jack-of-all-trades as he immerses himself in exciting and sometimes dirty jobs caring for animals. A vet's assistant caring for Rhinos, a Bat researcher in South America, working with a King Cobra in Malaysia, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack for an adventure with rare and unique animals that all wear white. Arctic wolves, beluga whales, polar bears, white zebras and even an albino alligator!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top Cats
programme.desc: From breathtaking tigers to elusive ocelots, lightning-fast cheetahs, leaping leopards, and the rarest lions on Earth. Join Jack Hanna for this Wild Countdown featuring 10 unforgettable encounters with nature’s top cats!

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A woman's (Joan Rivers) shyness around men is exacerbated by her recent mastectomy that is until she meets an understanding man. Meanwhile, when a married couple contemplates divorce, it's their son, who's also a lawyer, that gets caught in the middle.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When an elderly man's granddaughter falls for one of his fresh-faced friends, the man seeks out some of the youth potion for himself. Meanwhile, things start moving a little too fast for Isaac and the woman he's dating.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A sarcastic woman (Anne Meara) goes on a rampage when she finds out she's on a cruise with the same man she's suing (Jerry Stiller) for damages. Meanwhile, a famous professor meets a former student who is hired to replace his mentor/

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When Stubing meets a gorgeous movie queen (Joan Collins), who recently shed her ninth husband, he is fascinated by her charm and beauty. Then, a man decides to prioritize golf over his wife, so the neglected woman decides to play ball with an old friend.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: The captain's daughter is put in a tough situation she is accused of stealing supplements from Doc's office. Then, Gopher's uncle (Red Button) falls in love with the lady who runs the ship's gift shop.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: The vivacious Hannah Harvye (Mary Martin) immediately becomes involved with the crew and rekindles a romance with an old flame. An unassuming man (Ben Murphy) finds himself in a tight situation with a maid he's never met. Gopher saves a man's life.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A jilted fiance hires a Mata Hari (Elaine Joyce) to find the crew member that ruined his wedding plans; a junior executive (Parker Stevenson) suffers in silence while his boss (David Doyle) lusts after his bride.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A married couple finds out that their daughter is in love with the father's best friend, while a progressive woman agrees to help her romantic partner have an affair.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When an organization wants to give a crew member an award, Captain Stubing suggests Isaac. Meanwhile, a fun-loving guy tries to help out his heartbroken friend but finds himself in trouble after meeting an unusual woman.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: The professional escort of an older woman (Vera Miles) dallies with a young woman (Constance Forslund); an advertising whiz tries to impress his best client despite putdowns from her daughter.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An estranged mother and daughter mend their relationship after a secret about their past is revealed. Then, an attractive widow finds herself falling for a burly crew member.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An author (Tom Poston) is blackmailed by his secretary; a father and son (Geoffrey Scott, Clark Brandon) unwittingly fall for the same woman (Markie Post).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An Army captain (Beth Howland) sets her sights on Gopher; a married couple (Charlotte Rae, Louis Nye) meet up with two swingers (Jamie Farr, Heather Locklear).

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: New Forensic Techniques used to Solve Old Cases: Advancement in science and technology are encouraging people to revisit the past in hopes of answering questions that have remained unanswered, and solving crimes that seemed unsolvable.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: They say that a burden shared is a burden halved, but when partners team up to commit murder, the weight of their guilt remains just as heavy. Investigators must rely on forensic science to capture partners in crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When abduction turns to murder, forensic science is the only key to finding justice for the victims of a kidnapper's deadly intentions.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Great Outdoors may offer great clues to solving brutal murders. But it takes the keen eye of the forensic entomologist and botanist to decipher the clues nature provides.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: An abandoned car outside Philadelphia brings heartbreak to a family and terror to a community. A young woman is dead, the killer gone. But the marks of his passage remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For a price, anything's possible. Contract killings arose out of the need to establish the perfect alibi. By hiring someone else to do the dirty work, a person can deflect guilt, at least in theory.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a victim is gunned down at point-blank range, police often assume that a friend or acquaintance is to blame.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Handwriting Analysis: We've all heard that our handwriting tells more about our personalities than we think. Are we risk-takers, have low-esteem, fun loving, or are we capable of murder?

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When teenagers are driven to kill, their victims are but the first to fall. In three such cases, the families of the killers, as well as their communities, become the victims of violent crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When there's a difficult case to crack – whether it involves drugs, arson, or weapons – the investigators and scientists of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms have the means to crack it.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Terrorism: Thanks to new technology and, perhaps, the approaching millennium, terrorism is a growing international threat. The Oklahoma City explosion and the bombing of the World Trade Center are just two of the incidents of this growing problem.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: “To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth”.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hiding a body can be difficult; it's sometimes easier to obscure or disguise the circumstances of the death, turning murder into suicide, or pinning the blame on someone else. The truth is told through subtle clues taken from the crime scene.

programme.desc: When a rancher dies after the bank forecloses the mortgage on his property, his son blames the banker for his father's death.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: When Angela decides that she needs a new dog as a fashion accessory Rev puts his foot down.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In an attempt to find out more about his daughter's lives, Tip participates in something he wouldn't normally do. But as the girls start to dish the details, is Tip ready to hear what they have to say? Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: After Messiah and Domani rescue Precious from an asthma attack, Tip makes sure the kids have proper training for any emergency situation. Meanwhile, Tameka and Shekinah head off to a retreat and put their friendship to the test. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In an effort to teach their family about teamwork, Tip and Tameka take the kids to Space Camp. But when the kids have a difficult time working together, their mission becomes jeopardized. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Tameka finally convinces Tip to get the kids something they've wanted for years, the kids are ecstatic. But before it becomes official the kids are put to the test to see if they are responsible enough for something this big. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Russell Simmons stops by the Harris home he and Domani hit it off. With Niq Niq getting ready to leave the nest Tameka is having a hard time letting go and arranges a day for their friends to spend together to give them life advice. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: To set an example for her children, Tameka is motivated to hit the books and get her GED. Meanwhile, with his teenage sons racking up the phone bill, Tip takes them to a place where they can earn money - the hard way. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. and Tiny decide to celebrate their union with a trip for two to Costa Rica. However, when the family catches wind of this planned getaway, T.I. and Tiny feel the pressure to make it a family vacation. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tiny's firstborn child, Niq Niq has decided she's ready to move out. Meanwhile, Messiah seeks permission from T.I. to obtain a Driver's permit, but T.I. has some of his own unorthodox tests for Messiah to pass first. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: A longtime friend of the family, Crow, seeks T.I.'s expert advice and guidance in obtaining some female companionship. Meanwhile, Tiny discovers Niq Niq hasn't been completely honest about where she is and what she's doing. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: With a thousand dollars on the line, T.I. and K-Dub test Major's knowledge against the people of Atlanta. Tiny and Niq Niq are on a health kick and a recently single Precious is determined to join them in attempts to get herself a man. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I.'s friend K-Dub needs a place to stay, but after a few days, he overstays his welcome with the family. Meanwhile, King is inspired to set a world record and goes on a search to find one thing he can do that no one else can. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. is excited about his role in the new Superhero movie Ant-Man. Unfortunately, King and Major aren't. A proactive Tiny hatches a plan to nix any baby fever Niq Niq might have.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Major wants to take acting to the next level but struggles to focus. T.I. notices his older children don't help one another, so he takes them to a place where they are locked in a room & the only one way out is to work together. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Karen and Renee's hatred toward Natalie continues to grow as the social media war spirals out of control. Ang arranges a meet-up with everyone which takes tensions to an all time high and ignites a new never-ending battle.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: The fiery feud between Karen and Natalie continues to reach new heights. While Renee gets word that her ex husband has been sentenced, Drita finds out some new incriminating information about her Philly friend Natalie.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Drita prepares for a family vacation while playing middle man between enemies. Karen tries to balance issues with her ex. Ang attemps to gather the girls for a Thanksgiving dinner in hopes that Renee and Natalie can make amends.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Renee reunites with a longtime friend from her past. Natalie and London turn to couples therapy. Nat D invites all the women to her charity event but when one of the girls is a no-show, Nat D's temper begins to flare.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Renee decides to take her newfound peace to the next level. Karen receives a letter from her father. Drita continues to maintain her loyalty to Natalie, but is pushed to the edge after a sit-down with Nat D.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Drita struggles to keep calm after discovering Natalie's deceitful ways. Renee throws a party to celebrate her spiritual cleansing. The two Natalies nearly come face to face, but some unexpected guests disturb the celebration.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: New accusations are thrown and alliances are shifted in part one of the epic two part reunion, hosted by Vivica Fox. Drita, Renee, Ang, Karen, and Natalie sit down for an explosive look back at the past season.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Vivica Fox hosts as Nat D joins Drita, Renee, Ang, Karen, and Natalie for part two of the reunion. The cast continues to look back at the past season and the two Natalie's come face-to-face to hash out their season long battle.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: A fresh group of West Coast basketball wives, girlfriends, fiancées and exes deal with life in SoCal's hottest hub for gossip and game. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Jackie prepares for her annual renewal of vows to Doug Christie, but will Draya make the cut for an invite? Jackie's bachelorette party nearly boils over when some surprise guests turn up the heat. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
