programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A bounty hunter is not a hero in his own hometown, as Josh learns when he honors a dying friend's request to return his body to Cameron and the townspeople rush to judgment, believing Josh killed him for the reward money.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is approached by the wife of a wanted man eager to turn himself in peacefully, provided Josh splits the bounty with his wife.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition into the desert to locate the cache of Spanish gold.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When a young runaway is framed for killing a Pinkerton agent, Randall turns detective to uncover the real killer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is requested to meet a famous singer at the opera house in Denver who has a job for him.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh comes to the aid of his old friend Jesse, who is being strong-armed into selling the Outrider Hotel and Saloon owned by his beautiful girlfriend.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A decidedly different and dangerous assignment awaits Josh when he agrees to go into the Apache camp and compete in their contests to win the hand of a woman.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Pursuing killer Joe Collins into the Superstition Mountains, Josh is followed by a man who believes Collins could be his long-lost son.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A blindly obedient religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh receives a letter from a girl at the St.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A concerned father hires Josh to retrieve his son, a passionate young ideologue whose gift for rousing rhetoric is being used by plunderers to recruit freedom fighters.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh's big talk after a dog is shot lands him in big trouble when his browbeating the locals in the saloon about ending the decades-long Carter-Blake feud.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down the cheating tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's protégé, a 12-year-old orphan boy and card cheat, nicknamed The Montana Kid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest and loneliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall finds his prey in the hands of a lynch mob wiping out his bounty.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Who needs enemies with friends like the residents of Rogue City, who celebrate Randall for bringing in notorious killer Jumbo Kane.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Against better judgment after losing a quick draw contest and bet, Josh serves as a guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman who comes west to retrieve and replace a defective gun he sold to notorious outlaw Curly Bill Brocius.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter and the horses he stole, Josh rides into a town ruled as the private fiefdom of its autocratic, psychopathic marshal who is holding the horses and deserter.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Hired by a father to bring back the man who killed his son Josh is surprised when he doesn't get paid because he brought the man back alive.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh must bring a man back for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings a wanted man into the Mesa City Sheriff, only to find he killed the sheriff's brother.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is looking for a man who, while trying to rob a bank, is bitten by a rabid dog.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man shoots his brother over ownership of their property and blames it on an Indian who reclaimed his horse the man found and stole.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is captured by a corrupt deputy and is forced by the sheriff to work on a chain gang in a gold mine.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is joined by his friend Ernie Backwater, an aging sheriff who is out to capture Will Tybee, a wanted fugitive who has spent his life searching for the man who murdered his son.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is escorting a unique prisoner to a trial and certain conviction. A man who has been married seven times and murdered all of them.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is asked by the wife of a man who is condemned to die to visit him in prison and see if new evidence can be found to clear her husband.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is hired to escort a Rani and her party across 150 miles of desert to a safe haven. The Rani is from a country fighting a civil war and she is to be the new leader if her side is victorious.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A letter from a friend brings Paladin to a bar where he's drugged. He wakes up chained and in the company of a man with a similar story and a woman who's path they've both crossed before.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Carl Soddenberg committed a heinous, murderous act. Paladin is hired to get him to an asylum and keep the family's survivors at bay who are out for revenge.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: An art collector hires Paladin to guide him, and his strangely childlike daughter, to the camp of a reclusive sculptor.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Colonel Draco invites Paladin to investigate an "insurrection" over water rights. Paladin discovers that Draco was crippled eight months previously and wants revenge.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin comes to pay his respects to the mother of a Chinese man who is killed. She asks Paladin to meet a ship bound for China and see that her granddaughter is brought safely aboard.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is riding to meet a lovely French lady in Los Angelos. On the way he encounters an Indian maiden being attacked.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: In love with Sally Wilson, Bill Hartley strikes a vein of silver while working on Tombstone's Main Street and sees a chance to win her heart. But when Bill is buried in a cave in, Sally must decide if she saves Bill or guard the secret of the mine.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: An outlaw gang ambushes a Mexican pack train near Tombstone. Don Jacinto Orosco, the sole survivor of the attack, refuses to wait for American law to deal justice to the gang. Instead, he sends for heavily-armed Mexicans to wipe out the killers.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Frank Callaway wins acquittal for a client and then escapes death at the hands of the two men who tried to frame his client. Sheriff Hollister captures the killer but no lawyer will accept the defense; so Callaway himself volunteers.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: The World's Fastest Gun,' Billy Denver, comes to Tombstone to perform. Challenged by Johnny's Pearce, he faces his first human target - and kills him. When Johnny's brother hears the news, he heads for Tombstone to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Elias Ransome brings his band of religious emigrants to the outskirts of Tombstone, but a prejudiced rancher stirs up agitation against the newcomers, leading to an air of intolerance. Hollister and Clabourne must step in to resolve the situation.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A gunslinger en route to Durango seeks Doc Holliday to gun him down for the murder of his brother. Passing through Tombstone, he becomes the enemy of two of the West's slickest draws -- Sheriff Hollister and the infamous dentist-turned-gunman.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A handsome cowboy makes eyes at an immigrant miner's pretty daughter and upsets her staid European ideals. Betrothed by her father to a young miner, she forsakes him and her old-world traditions by leaving home to become an 'American lady.'

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: George and Patricia Camden, two people out of rancher Aaron McClain's shady past, blackmail him. Aided by a mysterious accomplice, McClain evens the score by murdering George, and Sheriff Hollister is plunged into a dangerous manhunt.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Old Man Clinton forces Bill Doolin - just out of prison - into an attempt to kill Sheriff Clay Hollister as Clay is the only witness against his two renegade sons. Dooline picks a fight with Clay who risks his life to get to the bottom of the plot.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Julie Dixon takes a job as a dealer in Tombstone's Saloon. Here, she deals a grim hand of vengeance. Her brother Sam, an incurable gambler, had killed Julie's lover six months before. She has taken the job as part of a plan to wreak revenge on Sam.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Mrs. McGill resorts to guns to save their water and pasture for Hap Dorsett who she hopes will marry her daughter.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp is involved in the backlash from Custer's last battle when crooked Indian agents come to Dodge City to blame the army and Capt. Benteen for the loss.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp arrests a drunk Sgt. Craig for killing an Indian in a Dodge City store. However, the Captain at Fort Dodge has other ideas about whether it is a crime for a soldier to kill an Indian.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Ben Thompson returns as a dealer at a saloon outside Dodge City. When he is caught cheating, he engages in a gunfight with several hands from the Circle Bar ranch.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: George Morris is willing to pay $1500 to Rule Hawes who was a Tennessee sharpshooter to kill Earp.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Wells Fargo asks Earp to help stop holdups by Curly Bill Brocius' gang at the station called the Little Alamo.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp receives word that Fred Colby has been released from prison. Earp has no knowledge of him so he fills in the blanks with info from Hal, others and old city records.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
